ygData.messageBody:
many months ago, i was in a group in sol B of 4 total bards and 2 casters.
shortly after we all started playing mana song, the ENTIRE server was not
able to cast. yes, that is right, 4+ bards in one group will remove ALL
mana from every caster on your server. use with caution.

Shada Bladestorm, L50 Wood Elf Bard
Tyria Sarkin, L30 High Elf Wizard
Manda D'ulin, L22 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server

p.s. i think i have seen that happen to my server 2 or 3 times, where no one
could cast without camping or zoning. pretty funny coincidence that the
first time i saw it happen was just as we 4 bards got together in this one
group. and yes the mana recovery was staggering.


> From: David Knadler <dknadler@...>
>
> Just for the fun of it, has anyone tried a 5 bard, 1 wizard
> party (all the
> bards singing clarity)? It would be interesting to see just
> how much mana
> the wiz could cruise through.
>
> Desmei Sightblinder
> Lvl 32 Bard [Povar]
